applicant-name.name: KABUSHIKI KAISHA SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD

abstract.p: Effective advertisements are provided to users of a network. On a terminal of a user B, user names of users whom the user B registered in advance as friends are displayed. On the terminal, information indicating whether respective friend users are online or offline, is also displayed. Icons representing video games, etc., played by the friend users are also displayed on the terminal. When the user B clicks the icon of the Game C associated with the user A, the terminal executes advertisement information display processing. By this processing, an advertisement information screen is displayed on the terminal. On the advertisement information screen, an advertisement relating to the status of the user A registered as the friend is displayed.

applicant-name.name: SQUARE ENIX KK TRADING CO LTD [JP]
KABUSHIKI KAISHA SQUARE ENIX (ALSO TRADING AS SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD.)

abstract.p: Effective advertisements are provided to users of a network. On a terminal of a user B, user names of users whom the user B registered in advance as friends are displayed. On the terminal, information indicating whether respective friend users are online or offline, is also displayed. Icons representing video games, etc., played by the friend users are also displayed on the terminal. When the user B clicks the icon of the Game C associated with the user A, the terminal executes advertisement information display processing. By this processing, an advertisement information screen is displayed on the terminal. On the advertisement information screen, an advertisement relating to the status of the user A registered as the friend is displayed. <IMAGE> <IMAGE>

bibliographic-data.invention-title: ADVERTISEMENT DISTRIBUTION SYSTEM, ADVERTISEMENT DISTRIBUTION SERVER, ADVERTISEMENT DISTRIBUTION PROGRAM AND RECORDING MEDIUM ON WHICH ADVERTISEMENT DISTRIBUTION PROGRAM IS RECORDED

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To perform effective advertisement to a user utilizing a network.

SOLUTION: As shown in drawing (a), users (user A, user D, ...) whom user B has registered as a friend in advance to a server, each user's circumstances, that is, whether it is online or not and an icon (game C, game A,...) showing a playing video game or the like are displayed at a user B's terminal. When user B clicks "game C" of "user A", user B's terminal performs advertising information display treatment. By this treatment, an advertising information screen 231 is displayed at a part of a display screen of a terminal 1B as shown in drawing (b). In the advertising information screen 231, advertisement relevant to circumstances ("Game C") of user A whom user B has registered as a friend is exhibited. Since it is supposed that degree of interest of user B to the advertisement is high, high advertising effect can be exhibited.
